name: Altogether
description:
No man, woman or child is an island, but you currently find yourself on one in Altogether.

Build bridges to other floating islands with materials you find on the island. Need more materials? Send friends this URL so they can send you more https://vr-tower.herokuapp.com/spawner.

 Altogether, reach out to other magical islands with help from your friends.

Game created with Unity, with assets created in Google Blocks. TowerNumber9 team includes Buck DeFore (code), Yuxin Gao (art), Alex Lau (code), Brett Phares (art), Robert Tang (code). Music by Josh Brechner.
